'''Bedrock Editor v1.1.8''' is a minor release for [[Bedrock Editor]] released on October 29, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/270|title=Release 1.1.8 (1.21.130.24)|website=GitHub|date=October 29, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/40708241210765-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-130-24|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.130.24|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=October 29, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added cursor setting to Farm Generator tool; player can place the farm at a position with the target mode.

== Changes ==
* Adds a new {{cd|EditorTagContainer}} UI component with accompanying modal for adding tags. Swapped theme color mapping for {{cd|SecondaryActive}} and {{cd|SecondaryDefault}}.
